name: B. Duff in Love
statement:
Duff is in love with lovely numbers! A positive integer is called if and
only if there is no such positive integer such that is a divisor of .
Malek has a number store! In his store, he has only divisors of positive
integer (and he has all of them). As a birthday present, Malek wants to
give her a number from his store. He wants this number to be as big as
possible.Malek always had issues in math, so he asked for your help.
Please tell him what is the biggest lovely number in his store.
